p:
Microbial dilutions were incubated on HA discs for 24 h at 37 °C. Next, the surfaces were rinsed 3x with 0.9% NaCl to remove non-adherent, loosely bound bacteria and to leave only biofilm forms of pathogens. Next, the samples were fixed and analyzed using Zeiss EVO MA25 scanning electron microscope (SEM) (Carl Zeiss, Germany) as described in our earlier study
31 .
